definition: to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)

sentences.english: Also, the developer will offer another ten percent mortgage to purchasers.
sentences.chinese: 開發商可提供一成的按揭給認購者。

sentences.english: The purchaser signing the subscription document must be cautious and avoid falling into the trap.
sentences.chinese: 購買人簽定樓宇認購書應謹防誤入陷阱。

sentences.english: In power card market, subscriber power card rise and drop half-and-half , but the oscillation amplitude squeezes obviously.
sentences.chinese: 權證市場上，認購權證漲跌參半，但振幅明顯收窄。

sentences.english: The key of implementation of housing offers is that both sides of their rights and obligations.
sentences.chinese: 商品房認購書的履行，其關鍵在於雙方的權利義務。

sentences.english: The schemes were over-subscribed by seven times.
sentences.chinese: 兩項計劃的單位，超額認購七倍。

sentences.english: They underwrote the coal mine's bonds.
sentences.chinese: 他們同意買下該煤礦的未認購的股票。

sentences.english: When it was founded, members were required to subscribe to its capitalization.
sentences.chinese: 在創辦時，它要求成員國認購股份，提供資本金。

sentences.english: Derivative warrants are generally divided into two types: calls and puts.
sentences.chinese: 衍生權證可分爲認購證和認沽證兩種。

sentences.english: The subscriber shall pay money for the number of the shares he subscribes for.
sentences.chinese: 認股人按照所認購股數繳納股款。

sentences.english: The substance of subscription for commercial buildings is a precontract of commercial buildings sales.
sentences.chinese: “商品房認購書”的實質是商品房買賣預約合同。

sentences.english: Shares in nine companies involved in a third round of subscriptions for the board were oversubscribed.
sentences.chinese: 第三批在該板塊上市的九家公司的股份被超額認購。

sentences.english: The dinner will cater for 50 tables.
sentences.chinese: 晚宴將筵開50席，其中45席供會員認購。

sentences.english: Bond auctions continue to be well covered.
sentences.chinese: 債券拍賣繼續得到充分認購。

sentences.english: Tickets for the talk had been sold out.
sentences.chinese: 演講會的門票已被認購一空。

sentences.english: the subtle subscriber found the prescription manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 敏感的認購者找處處方原稿。

sentences.english: The subscriber to a government loan has got higher interest than savings.
sentences.chinese: 公債認購者獲得高於儲蓄的利息。

definition: to publish/to issue (stocks, currency etc)/to release/to distribute (a film)
to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
